ul.li: "right", "right center" and "center right" mean the same as "100%50%".

body.p: If statement above is passed, this paragraph should have a flag image which is centered to the right with regard to this paragraph text. The rule applied is "#id1 {background-position: right}". aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa The rule "p {background-image: url(flagbg.gif)}" is also applied above. All other properties of this page should be UA-default. This is a paragraph, like the one above. However, it may not be long enought to support a background image. Also "p {background-repeat: no-repeat;}".
